GenotypeGraph

Class GenotypeNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • GenotypeGraph.GenotypeNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<GenotypeNode>

    public class GenotypeNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<GenotypeNode>
    A base class for a single node from a genotype graph (based on adjacency matrix)
    Author:
    rossi INVARIANT: numberOfMutations = #count of true in genotype probability, steadyStateProbability in [0,1]

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean[] genotype
      the state of mutations relative of this node
      (package private) int id
      unique id to be used for next node
      private long numberOfMutations
      count of mutated genes in the genotype associated with this node
      (package private) double probability
      Observed probability extracted from dataset
      (package private) double steadyStateProbability
      Probability at the 'steady state' of this node

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GenotypeNode(boolean[] genotype, int id)
      Default constructor, creates a node labeled with a genotype

      • compareGenotype

        private int compareGenotype(boolean[] other)
        Comparison of two genotypes A and B. (lexical order) A is considered bigger than B if the binary number it represents is bigger than that of B
        Parameters:
        other - B's genotype
        Returns:
        0 if A=B, 1 if A>B, -1 else

      • containsAndOnlyOneMore

        public boolean containsAndOnlyOneMore(GenotypeNode other)
        Checks if this node has a genotype containing one mutation more than the other node
        Parameters:
        other -
        Returns:
        true if this node has a genotype containing one mutation more than the other node, false otherwise

      • contains

        public boolean contains(GenotypeNode other)
        Checks if this node has a genotype containing more mutations than the other node (there are no genes that are mutated in other but not in this)
        Parameters:

        Returns:
